author: Sarah Moss
title: Struggling with self-isolation? Australia's first astronaut has some advice for surviving in confinement
description: With a lot of us self-isolating and working from small office spaces in the house, it's a tough time for families trying to adapt to a new home life. Here are some tips for survival from an Astronaut and expert at working in confinement.
content:
Updated 
March 30, 2020 09:09:05
Australia's first astronaut, Andy Thomas, is no stranger to living and working in a confined space and has some advice for families adapting to new lives of self-isolation and working from small spaces at home.
